00015 static t_class  *s_jslider_class = 0;
00016 static t_symbol *ps_slider, *ps_hslider, *ps_preset;

00020 static t_pt s_jslider_cum;
00021 static double s_jslider_startval;
00022 
00023 #define INRANGE(v,lo,hi) ((v)<=(hi)&&(v)>=(lo))
00024 
00025 #define JSLIDER_BORDERTHICKNESS         (2.)
00026 #define JSLIDER_CORNERSIZE              (6.)
00027 
00028 #define JSLIDER_DISPLAYINSET            5       // amount subtracted from rect for value
00029 
00030 typedef struct _jslider
00031 {
00032     t_jbox      j_box;
00033     double      j_min;          
00034     double      j_size;         // number of steps
00035     double      j_mult;
00036     double      j_val;
00037     char        j_floatoutput;
00038     char        j_horiz;
00039     char        j_relative;     // relative mousing (like orig miller slider, but not like h/uslider)
00040     char        j_orientation;  // 0 = auto, 1 = horiz, 2 = vertical
00041     t_jrgba     j_brgba;
00042     t_jrgba     j_frgba;
00043     t_jrgba     j_frgba2;
00044 } t_jslider;

00072 int main()
00073 {
00074     t_class *c; 
00075 
00076     common_symbols_init();
00077 
00078     c = class_new("slider", 
00079                   (method)jslider_new,
00080                   (method)jslider_free,
00081                   sizeof(t_jslider),
00082                   (method)NULL,
00083                   A_GIMME,
00084                   0L);
00085 
00086     c->c_flags |= CLASS_FLAG_NEWDICTIONARY; // to specify dictionary constructor
00087 
00088     jbox_initclass(c, JBOX_FIXWIDTH | JBOX_COLOR);
00089 
00090     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_paint, "paint", A_CANT, 0);
00091     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_stdargs, "stdargs", A_CANT, 0); 
00092 
00093     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_int, "int", A_LONG, 0);
00094     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_float, "float", A_FLOAT, 0); 
00095     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_bang, "bang", 0);
00096     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_set, "set", A_GIMME, 0);
00097     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_setminmax, "setminmax", A_GIMME, 0);
00098     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_getdrawparams, "getdrawparams", A_CANT, 0);
00099     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_mousedown, "mousedown", A_CANT, 0);
00100     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_mousedragdelta, "mousedragdelta", A_CANT, 0);
00101     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_mouseup, "mouseup", A_CANT, 0);
00102     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_getvalueof, "getvalueof", A_CANT, 0); 
00103     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_setvalueof, "setvalueof", A_CANT, 0); 
00104     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_assist, "assist", A_CANT, 0); 
00105     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_preset, "preset", 0);
00106     class_addmethod(c, (method)jslider_notify, "notify", A_CANT, 0); 
00107     
00108     CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,"patching_rect",0, "0. 0. 20. 140.");
00109     
00110     CLASS_STICKY_ATTR(c,"category",0,"Value");
00111     CLASS_ATTR_DOUBLE(c, "size", 0, t_jslider, j_size);
00112     CLASS_ATTR_ACCESSORS(c,"size",(method)NULL,(method)jslider_setattr_size);
00113 
00114     CLASS_ATTR_DOUBLE(c, "min", 0, t_jslider, j_min);
00115     CLASS_ATTR_DOUBLE(c, "mult", 0, t_jslider, j_mult);
00116     
00117     CLASS_ATTR_CHAR(c, "floatoutput", 0, t_jslider, j_floatoutput);
00118     CLASS_ATTR_ACCESSORS(c, "floatoutput", (method)NULL, (method)jslider_setattr_floatoutput);
00119     
00120     CLASS_ATTR_CHAR(c,"relative", 0, t_jslider, j_relative);
00121     CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c,"relative", 0, "Mousing Mode");
00122     CLASS_ATTR_ENUMINDEX(c, "relative", 0, "Absolute Relative");
00123     CLASS_STICKY_ATTR_CLEAR(c, "category");
00124     
00125     CLASS_ATTR_CHAR(c,"orientation",0,t_jslider,j_orientation);
00126     CLASS_ATTR_LABEL(c,"orientation",0,"Orientation");
00127     CLASS_ATTR_ENUMINDEX(c,"orientation", 0,"Automatic Horizontal Vertical");
00128     CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT_SAVE_PAINT(c, "orientation", 0, "0");
00129     CLASS_ATTR_CATEGORY(c, "orientation", 0, "Appearance");
00130     
00131     CLASS_STICKY_ATTR(c, "category", 0, "Color");
00132     CLASS_ATTR_RGBA_LEGACY(c, "bgcolor", "brgb", 0, t_jslider, j_brgba);
00133     CLASS_ATTR_ALIAS(c,"bgcolor", "brgba");

00152

00161     CLASS_ATTR_STYLE_LABEL(c,"floatoutput",0,"onoff","Float Output");
00162     
00163     CLASS_ATTR_ORDER(c, "floatoutput",  0, "1");
00164     CLASS_ATTR_ORDER(c, "relative",     0, "2");
00165     CLASS_ATTR_ORDER(c, "size",         0, "3");
00166     CLASS_ATTR_ORDER(c, "min",          0, "4");
00167     CLASS_ATTR_ORDER(c, "mult",         0, "5");
00168 
00169     class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00170     s_jslider_class = c;
00171     
00172     ps_hslider = gensym("hslider");
00173     ps_slider = gensym("slider");
00174     ps_preset = gensym("_preset");
00175     return 0;
00176 }
00177 
00178 // slider has 6 args: x, y, w, size (height), min, and mult
00179 void *jslider_stdargs(t_dictionary *d, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00180 {
00181     long left, top, width, height, thin, length;
00182     short horiz, type;
00183     t_atom at[4];
00184     
00185     horiz = (s == ps_hslider) ? 1 : 0;
00186     type = (s == ps_slider) ? 0 : 1; // Miller's original slider (relative mousing by default)
00187             
00188     if (d && argc>3 && argv) {
00189     
00190         // all psaved versions should have the first 4 args, even if it's a really old patch
00191         left = atom_getlong(argv);
00192         top = atom_getlong(argv+1);
00193         thin = atom_getlong(argv+2);
00194         length = atom_getlong(argv+3);
00195         height = (horiz) ? thin : length+(type?16:7); // we need to add 16 because we have an 8 pixel border on either side of x->s_size
00196         width = (horiz) ? length+(16) : thin; // old vanilla slider was always vert so we don't need to check type
00197         
00198         atom_setlong(at+0, left);
00199         atom_setlong(at+1, top);
00200         atom_setlong(at+2, width);
00201         atom_setlong(at+3, height);
00202         
00203         dictionary_appendatoms(d, _sym_patching_rect, 4, at); // rect is x y width, height, like t_rect, but with long args
00204         
00205         //dictionary_appendatom(d, gensym("max"), argv+3);  // argv+3 is both the max and the height when importing from a miller slider
00206         // slider and u/hslider have different order... don't ask why...
00207         if (!type && argc > 5) {
00208             dictionary_appendatom(d, gensym("size"), argv+3);
00209             dictionary_appendatom(d, gensym("min"), argv+4); 
00210             dictionary_appendatom(d, gensym("mult"), argv+5); 
00211         } else if (type && argc > 6) {
00212             dictionary_appendatom(d, gensym("size"), argv+4);
00213             dictionary_appendatom(d, gensym("mult"), argv+5); 
00214             dictionary_appendatom(d, gensym("min"), argv+6); 
00215         }
00216 
00217         // if it's an old slider and we're doing the stdargs then it's forced either horiz or vert, for compatibility
00218         if (horiz)
00219             dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("orientation"), 1); // force horizontal
00220         else
00221             dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("orientation"), 2); // force vertical
00222             
00223         dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("relative"), type ? 0 : 1); 
00224         
00225         // if it's hslider/uslider it does have an extra value which defines the color background
00226         if (type && argc > 7) {
00227             t_jrgba bgcolor;
00228             long color = CLIP(atom_getlong(argv+7), 0, 15); // constrains colors to 0-15 zone
00229             set_jrgba_from_boxcolor_index(color + 1, &bgcolor);
00230             
00231             dictionary_appendjrgba(d, gensym("bgcolor"), &bgcolor);
00232         }
00233     }
00234     return 0;
00235 }
00236 
00237 void *jslider_new(t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00238 {
00239     t_jslider* x;
00240     long flags; 
00241     t_dictionary *d=NULL;
00242     
00243     if (!(d=object_dictionaryarg(argc,argv)))
00244         return NULL;
00245     
00246     x = (t_jslider *) object_alloc(s_jslider_class);
00247     if (!x)
00248         return NULL;
00249 
00250     flags = 0 
00251             | JBOX_DRAWFIRSTIN 
00252             | JBOX_NODRAWBOX
00253             | JBOX_DRAWINLAST           // rbs -- I think we can turn this off
00254     //      | JBOX_TRANSPARENT  
00255     //      | JBOX_NOGROW
00256     //      | JBOX_GROWY
00257             | JBOX_GROWBOTH
00258     //      | JBOX_HILITE
00259             | JBOX_DRAWBACKGROUND
00260             | JBOX_MOUSEDRAGDELTA
00261             | JBOX_DEFAULTNAMES
00262     //      | JBOX_NOFLOATINSPECTOR
00263             ;
00264 
00265     x->j_val = 0; 
00266 
00267     jbox_new(&x->j_box, flags, argc, argv);
00268     x->j_box.b_firstin = (t_object*) x;
00269     outlet_new((t_object *)x,NULL);
00270     x->j_floatoutput = -1;  // this makes sure that we don't clip the size until the floatoutput attribute is set.
00271     attr_dictionary_process(x,d); // handle attribute args  
00272     jbox_ready(&x->j_box);
00273     return x;
00274 }
00275 
00276 void jslider_assist(t_jslider *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00277 {
00278     if (m==ASSIST_INLET) {
00279             sprintf(s,"Displays Value Received");
00280     } 
00281     else {
00282         sprintf(s,"Outputs Value When Slider is Changed");
00283     }
00284 }
00285 
00286 void jslider_preset(t_jslider *x)
00287 {
00288     void *z;
00289     
00290     if (!(z = ps_preset->s_thing))
00291         return;
00292     
00293     binbuf_vinsert(z,"ossf",x,object_classname(x), _sym_float, x->j_val);
00294 }
00295 
00296 void jslider_free(t_jslider *x)
00297 {
00298     jbox_free(&x->j_box);
00299 }
00300 
00301 
00302 void jslider_paint(t_jslider *x, t_object *view)
00303 {
00304     t_rect rect;
00305     t_jgraphics *g;
00306     int pos;
00307     
00308     g = (t_jgraphics*) patcherview_get_jgraphics(view); 
00309     jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object *)x, view, &rect);
00310     jslider_orientation(x, &rect);
00311     pos = jslider_valtopos(x, x->j_val, &rect);
00312     if (x->j_horiz) {
00313         jgraphics_move_to(g, pos,3);
00314         jgraphics_line_to(g, pos,rect.height - 3);
00315     } else {
00316         jgraphics_move_to(g, 3, pos);
00317         jgraphics_line_to(g, rect.width - 3, pos);
00318     }
00319     jgraphics_set_line_width(g,3);
00320     jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &x->j_frgba);
00321     jgraphics_stroke(g);
00322 }
00323 
00324 void jslider_bang(t_jslider *x)
00325 {
00326     double value;
00327     
00328     value = x->j_val * x->j_mult;
00329     value += x->j_min;
00330     
00331     if (x->j_floatoutput)
00332         outlet_float(x->j_box.b_ob.o_outlet, value);
00333     else {
00334         long iv;
00335         
00336         iv = value + (value >= 0 ? 0.5 : -0.5); // rounding properly negative numbers too
00337         outlet_int(x->j_box.b_ob.o_outlet, iv);
00338     }
00339 }
00340 
00341 void jslider_int(t_jslider *x, long n)
00342 {
00343     jslider_assign(x, (double)n);
00344     jslider_bang(x); 
00345 }
00346 
00347 void jslider_float(t_jslider *x, double f)
00348 {
00349     jslider_assign(x, f);
00350     jslider_bang(x);
00351 }
00352 
00353 void jslider_setminmax(t_jslider *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00354 {
00355     double a, b;
00356     
00357     if (argc > 1) {
00358         a = b = 0;
00359         
00360         if (argv[0].a_type == A_LONG)
00361             a = (double)atom_getlong(&argv[0]);
00362         else if (argv[0].a_type == A_FLOAT)
00363             a = (double)atom_getfloat(&argv[0]);
00364 
00365         if (argv[1].a_type == A_LONG)
00366             b = (double)atom_getlong(&argv[1]);
00367         else if (argv[1].a_type == A_FLOAT)
00368             b = (double)atom_getfloat(&argv[1]);
00369         
00370         if (a == b) {
00371             x->j_min = 0.;
00372             x->j_size = 1.;
00373         } else  if (a < b) {
00374             x->j_min = a;
00375             x->j_size = b - a;
00376         } else {            
00377             x->j_min = b;
00378             x->j_size = a - b;
00379         }       
00380 
00381         x->j_floatoutput = 1;
00382     }
00383 }
00384 
00385 void jslider_set(t_jslider *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00386 {
00387     if (argc && (argv->a_type == A_FLOAT || argv->a_type == A_LONG))
00388         jslider_assign(x, atom_getfloat(argv)); 
00389 }
00390 
00391 t_max_err jslider_setattr_size(t_jslider *x, t_object *attr, long ac, t_atom *av)
00392 {
00393     double d;
00394     
00395     if (ac && av) {
00396         d = atom_getfloat(av);
00397         if (x->j_floatoutput == 1) {
00398             if (d < 1)
00399                 d = 1;
00400         } else if (x->j_floatoutput != -1) {
00401             d = (long)d;
00402             if (d < 2)
00403                 d = 2;
00404         }
00405         x->j_size = d;
00406         x->j_val = jslider_constrain(x, x->j_val);
00407     }
00408     return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00409 }
00410 
00411 t_max_err jslider_setattr_floatoutput(t_jslider *x, t_object *attr, long ac, t_atom *av)
00412 {
00413     if (ac && av) {
00414         x->j_floatoutput = atom_getlong(av) ? 1 : 0;
00415         object_attr_setfloat(x, gensym("size"), x->j_size); // make sure the range is correct
00416     }
00417     return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00418 }
00419 
00420 t_max_err jslider_setvalueof(t_jslider *x, long ac, t_atom *av)
00421 {
00422     if (ac && av) {
00423         if (av->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00424             jslider_float(x, atom_getfloat(av));
00425         else if (av->a_type == A_LONG)
00426             jslider_int(x, atom_getlong(av));
00427     }
00428     return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00429 }
00430 
00431 t_max_err jslider_getvalueof(t_jslider *x, long *ac, t_atom **av)
00432 {
00433     t_atom a;
00434     
00435     if (ac && av) { 
00436         if (*ac && *av) {
00437             //memory passed in use it
00438         } else {
00439             *av = (t_atom *)getbytes(sizeof(t_atom));
00440         }
00441         *ac = 1;
00442         if (x->j_floatoutput)
00443             atom_setfloat(&a,x->j_val);
00444         else
00445             atom_setlong(&a,(long)x->j_val);
00446         **av = a; 
00447     }
00448     return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00449 }
00450 
00451 void jslider_assign(t_jslider *x, double f)
00452 {
00453     x->j_val = jslider_constrain(x,f);
00454     object_notify(x, _sym_modified, NULL); 
00455     jbox_redraw(&x->j_box); 
00456 }
00457 
00458 double jslider_constrain(t_jslider *x, double f)
00459 {
00460     if (f < 0. || (f != f))     // rbs -- f != f tests for infinities and nans
00461         f = 0.;
00462         
00463     if (x->j_floatoutput) {     // constrain number between 0 and max, inclusive
00464         if (f > x->j_size)
00465             f = x->j_size;
00466         return f;
00467     } else {    // constrain number from 0 and max - 1
00468         long val; 
00469         long max = (long) x->j_size; 
00470         
00471         // rbs -- compare f to x->j_size which is a double. 
00472         // This way, if f is very big (bigger than max value a long can take)
00473         // there won't be a problem.  For example (long)(5672881664.) is actually negative!
00474         if (f > x->j_size)
00475             f = x->j_size; 
00476         val = (long) f;         // do cast now that we've limited the value
00477         if (val >= max)
00478             val = max - 1;
00479         return (double)val;
00480     }
00481 }
00482 
00483 void jslider_orientation(t_jslider *x, t_rect *r)
00484 {
00485     if (x->j_orientation == 0) { // automatic mode
00486         if (r->height > r->width)
00487             x->j_horiz = 0;
00488         else
00489             x->j_horiz = 1;
00490     } else
00491         x->j_horiz = x->j_orientation == 2 ? 0 : 1; 
00492 }
00493 
00494 double jslider_postoval(t_jslider *x, t_pt pt, t_rect *r)
00495 {
00496     double pos, range;
00497     
00498     if (x->j_horiz) {
00499         pos = pt.x;
00500         range = r->width;
00501     } else {
00502         pos = r->height - pt.y;
00503         range = r->height;
00504     }
00505     if (pos <= JSLIDER_DISPLAYINSET)
00506         pos = 0.;
00507     else {
00508         pos -= JSLIDER_DISPLAYINSET;
00509         pos = (pos / (range - (JSLIDER_DISPLAYINSET*2))) * x->j_size;
00510     }
00511     return jslider_constrain(x,pos);
00512 }
00513 
00514 double jslider_valtopos(t_jslider *x, double val, t_rect *r)
00515 {
00516     double pos, range;
00517     double size;
00518     
00519     if (x->j_horiz)
00520         range = r->width;
00521     else
00522         range = r->height;
00523     
00524     if (x->j_floatoutput)
00525         size = x->j_size;
00526     else
00527         size = x->j_size - 1;
00528     
00529     if (size < 0)
00530         size = 0;
00531     if (size)
00532         pos = (val / size) * (range - (JSLIDER_DISPLAYINSET*2));
00533     else
00534         pos = 0;
00535     
00536     pos += JSLIDER_DISPLAYINSET;
00537     if (x->j_horiz)
00538         return pos;
00539     else
00540         return r->height - pos;
00541 }
00542 
00543 void jslider_mousedown(t_jslider *x, t_object *patcherview, t_pt pt, long modifiers)
00544 {
00545     t_rect rect;
00546     double val; 
00547     
00548     jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object *)x, patcherview, &rect);
00549     s_jslider_cum.x = s_jslider_cum.y = 0;
00550     val = jslider_postoval(x,pt,&rect);
00551     if (!x->j_relative)
00552         jslider_float(x, val);  // set value immediately
00553     s_jslider_startval = x->j_val;
00554 }
00555 
00556 void jslider_mousedragdelta(t_jslider *x, t_object *patcherview, t_pt pt, long modifiers)
00557 {
00558     t_rect rect;
00559     double inc;
00560     double val, cval;
00561     double factor; 
00562     
00563     jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object *)x, patcherview, &rect);
00564     
00565     if (modifiers & eShiftKey) {
00566         pt.y *= 0.2;
00567         pt.x *= 0.2;
00568     }
00569     // need to cancel cum change if it is beyond zero or the max value
00570     s_jslider_cum.x += pt.x;
00571     s_jslider_cum.y -= pt.y;
00572     if (x->j_horiz) {
00573         factor = x->j_size / (rect.width - (JSLIDER_DISPLAYINSET*2));
00574         inc = s_jslider_cum.x * factor;
00575         val = s_jslider_startval + inc;
00576         if (! x->j_floatoutput)         // if shift is down, rounding make it work when the slider goes up in integer mode
00577             val = (long)(val + 0.5); 
00578         cval = jslider_constrain(x,val); 
00579         jslider_float(x,cval);
00580         // in case we were constrained, adjust the cum
00581         if (cval != val)
00582             s_jslider_cum.x = (cval-s_jslider_startval) / factor; 
00583     } else {
00584         factor = x->j_size / (rect.height - (JSLIDER_DISPLAYINSET*2)); 
00585         inc = s_jslider_cum.y * factor;
00586         val = s_jslider_startval + inc;
00587         if (! x->j_floatoutput)         // if shift is down, rounding make it work when the slider goes up in integer mode
00588             val = (long)(val + 0.5); 
00589         cval = jslider_constrain(x,val);
00590         jslider_float(x,cval);
00591         if (cval != val)
00592             s_jslider_cum.y = (cval - s_jslider_startval) / factor; 
00593     }
00594 }
00595 
00596 void jslider_mouseup(t_jslider *x, t_object *patcherview, t_pt pt, long modifiers)
00597 {
00598     double pos, vp; 
00599     t_rect rect; 
00600     double mx, my;
00601 
00602     jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object *)x, patcherview, &rect);
00603     jslider_orientation(x, &rect);
00604     pos = jslider_valtopos(x, x->j_val, &rect);
00605     vp = pos + 0.5;
00606     if (x->j_horiz) {
00607         mx = vp; 
00608         my = pt.y;  // have y position be same as where mouse down clicked
00609     } else {
00610         mx = pt.x;  // have x position be same as where mouse down clicked
00611         my = vp; 
00612     }
00613     jmouse_setposition_box(patcherview, (t_object*) x, mx, my); 
00614 }
00615 
00616 void jslider_getdrawparams(t_jslider *x, t_object *patcherview, t_jboxdrawparams *params)
00617 {
00618     params->d_borderthickness = JSLIDER_BORDERTHICKNESS;
00619     params->d_bordercolor = x->j_frgba2;
00620     params->d_cornersize = JSLIDER_CORNERSIZE; 
00621     params->d_boxfillcolor = x->j_brgba;
00622 }
00623 
00624 t_max_err jslider_notify(t_jslider *x, t_symbol *s, t_symbol *msg, void *sender, void *data)
00625 {
00626     long argc = 0;
00627     t_atom *argv = NULL;
00628     t_symbol *name;
00629     
00630     if (msg == _sym_attr_modified) {
00631         name = (t_symbol *)object_method((t_object *)data,_sym_getname);
00632         if (name == _sym_color) {
00633             object_attr_getvalueof(x, _sym_color, &argc, &argv);
00634             if (argc && argv) {
00635                 object_attr_setvalueof(x, _sym_bgcolor, argc, argv);
00636                 sysmem_freeptr(argv);
00637             }
00638         }
00639     }
00640     return jbox_notify((t_jbox *)x, s, msg, sender, data);
00641 }
